com.google.appinventor.client.settings

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.client.properties.Properties<EditableProperty>
      • com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties.EditableProperties
        • com.google.appinventor.client.settings.Settings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyChangeListener, Iterable<EditableProperty>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneralSettings, SplashSettings, YoungAndroidSettings, YoungAndroidSettings

    public abstract class Settings
extends EditableProperties
implements PropertyChangeListener
    Superclass for all specific settings.
